344730.name: Apotheon: Original Soundtrack
344730.description:
The Apotheon Original Soundtrack by Marios Aristopoulos

  • King of the Gods
  • Under the Gaze of Ares
  • The Oracle
  • In The Forest of Olympus
  • The Deer
  • Apollo's Palace
  • Hades Underworld
  • March from Hades
  • Trojan Shores
  • Achilles Heel
  • Maze of Athena
  • Street Musician - Welcome to the Agora
  • Street Musician - Dance of Dionysus
  • Street Musician - Apollo's Light
  • For Helen Part I
  • For Helen Part II
  • For Helen Part III
  • Ten Years of War
  • Defeat
  • Statemate
  • Victory
  • Atlantis
  • Ares - God of War
  • Road to Troy

Songs will be downloaded to the Soundtrack folder in your Apotheon Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\Apotheon\Soundtrack
344730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
